channel.description: Recent content in Android on Rohit Takhar

item.title: An application to visualize algorithms used in operating systems
item.description: OSAVA visualizes the different types of algorithms used in operating systems as given in Silberschatz et al. (2012). OSAVA has six modules each dedicated to a particular type of algorithm. A module asks the user to select one of the algorithms available in it and enter relevant information. The module displays a brief description of the selected algorithm and then simulates its working. Output is provided typically as a combination of text and illustrations.
